Package be.ac.umons.michelsurin.world

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
be.ac.umons.michelsurin.world.Cell
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
represents one cell of the board.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Coord coord
    the coordinates of the cell in the board.
    private boolean pawn
    true if there is a pawn, false otherwise.
    private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> wallOnSide
    contains all the statement about the wall on side of the cell.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Cell​(Coord coord, int sizeOfBoard)
    initiate a cell with his coordinates on the board and a wall if the cell is at board's boarder.

  • Field Details

    • coord

      private Coord coord
      the coordinates of the cell in the board.

    • pawn

      private boolean pawn
      true if there is a pawn, false otherwise.

    • wallOnSide

      private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> wallOnSide
      contains all the statement about the wall on side of the cell.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cell

      public Cell​(Coord coord, int sizeOfBoard)
      initiate a cell with his coordinates on the board and a wall if the cell is at board's boarder.
      Parameters:
      coord - the coordinates of the cell in the board.
      sizeOfBoard - the total size of the board. Used to determines if a cell is at the border of the board.

  • Method Details

    • hasPawn

      public boolean hasPawn()
      checks if the cell contains a pawn or not
      Returns:
      return true if there is a pawn on the cell, false otherwise.

    • wallTo

      public boolean wallTo​(Coord direction)
      given a direction, checks if there is a wall to this direction
      Parameters:
      direction - determines which side of the cell will be checked.
      Returns:
      true if there is a wall in the given direction, false otherwise.

    • setWallOnSide

      public void setWallOnSide​(java.lang.String side)
